graph

Interface NeighborProvider<T extends Node,S extends Edge<T>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExplicitGraph, LinkedGraph

    public interface NeighborProvider<T extends Node,S extends Edge<T>>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<S> getEdgesFrom(T node)
      Returns all one way edges starting from the given node, this encapsulates both the cost and the neighbor the node can go to.

    • Method Detail

      • getEdgesFrom

        java.util.Set<S> getEdgesFrom(T node)
        Returns all one way edges starting from the given node, this encapsulates both the cost and the neighbor the node can go to.
